title: How to use Camel extensions in Quarkus
content: Camel is the open source swiss knife framework for integration, with over 300 components allowing the integration between external systems. In this article we will learn how to use Camel extensions for Quarkus to build powerful Java Integrations. Using Camel with Quarkus Firstly, letâ€™s see which extensions you need to develop Camel applications with Quarkus. ...  The post appeared first on .
